high_descs: Move around to the right side of the bed, to the pillow on the right.
Pick up the right pillow on the bed.
Bring the pillow around to the left side of the bed, to the lamp on the table left of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the brown dresser then then turn left and walk to the mirror, then turn left and face the bed
Pick up the pillow that is on the bed closest to you
Turn left and walk to the end of the bed, then make a right and then another right to go around the bed. Walk to the night stand to the left of the bed
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the night stand to the left of the bed
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow under a lamp

high_descs: go to right side of bed
pick up pillow on right side of bed
go around bed to left bedside table with lamp
turn on lamp on bedside table
anns.task_desc: pick up right pillow, turn on lamp
